reviewText: Arrived on time. Happy with my purchase!!
Beautiful love story. Well written and casted. Vidya is one of the best actresses in Indian cinema.

I enjoy watching this movie so much even though I cried before the ending but True love prevail at the end. And hate and possession of the absent husband, who went half crazy found understanding at the end before he spreads her ashes upon the field of Adam Liliy flowers. I loved it and watches it often.

Beautiful love story. If you don't understand Hindi look up the song lyrics translated, it gives so much meaning to the story.
Emraan Hashmi performance is captivating as a tender and loving man. Vidya Balan captures the emotional side of this character
so believable.
Vidya Balan the best ever in this movie I like it very much!!!!  Emraan is perfect n his role !

Ever since I got this movie,I have been watching it over and over.
What a great story line.
Vidya Balan is so gorgeous and what a great actress.
Emraan made my entire family fell in love with him!!!!
LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS BEAUTIFUL STORY. SUPERB ACTING WHICH BROUGHT ME TO TEARS SEVERAL TI MES. SEE THIS MOVIE!
